# Video Script Template

Use this for P7.8, P7.20, P7.25, and P7.27.

## Metadata

1. Title:
2. Audience:
3. Target duration:
4. Owner:
5. Date:

## Core Message

1. What viewers should learn:
2. Why this matters:
3. Evidence anchors (docs/files/metrics):

## Script Structure

### 1) Hook (0:00-0:20)

1. One-line problem statement.
2. One-line value proposition.

### 2) Context (0:20-1:00)

1. Brief project context.
2. Scope and non-goals.

### 3) Main Demo/Content (1:00-<N>)

1. Step-by-step walkthrough.
2. Key calls-to-action or commands.
3. One limitation/caveat.

### 4) Wrap-Up (last 20-30s)

1. Recap of key points.
2. Where to learn more.

4. Duration:

## Review Checklist

1. Claims validated against docs.
2. Captions/transcript prepared.
3. Audio clarity acceptable.
4. Final URL recorded in roadmap/docs.
